summary: I WENT TO THE POST OFFICE, PARKED AND CUT THE CAR OFF.  WHEN I GOT READY TO DEPART.  I CUT THE CAR ON AND ATTEMPTED TO CHANGE THE GEAR INTO REVERSE.  THE GEAR WOULD NOT MOVE INTO REVERSE. SO I PUT THE CAR BACK INTO DRIVE, AND HAD ENOUGH SPACE TO GO FORWARD.  I DROVE HOME.  WHEN I ARRIVED, THE GEAR WOULD NOT STAY IN PARK.  THE CAR START ROLLING AND I HAD TO CUT THE IGNITION OFF TO STOP IT FROM ROLLING.  THE GEAR SHIFT IS STILL IN DRIVE.  HAD TO SECURE IT IN PLACE BY PUTTING BRICKS BEHIND CAR TO KEEP IT FROM ROLLING OUT OF DRIVEWAY.  *TR
